description.value:
Armor (Hide), Rare (Requires Attunement)
While wearing this armor, you can speak its command word to take on the form of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.NpvwE1feOHyEqAbP]{giant constrictor snake}. You retain this form as long as you like, but once you return to your normal form, you cannot use it again until after a long rest.
